snippet.title: Noctuary | Trailer #1
snippet.description:
Noctuary is a brand-new AVG designed and developed by Gratesca Studio. Its story takes place in a world called "Arboretia," where you can play as two mysterious characters, "Fancia Dream" and "Alina Nightsong." During their exciting adventure, they will meet other characters with varied personalities and abilities; defeat powerful Darkritters with their help; retrieve peace for their homeland, the Inlixaland, and gradually unveil the truth of an appalling being, the "Outsider."

The game footage being presented is Noctuary | Trailer_01. We hope you enjoy it! Wishlist Noctuary now on Steam. Thank you for your support.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2143680/Noctuary
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Gratesca_Studio
